short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle on Voxa. Relax. It works silently, auto-logging, creating, and associating e-mails with Salesforce.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voxa is a messaging intelligence platform that accelerates response time and unleashes the power of business email. Go faster, smarter.
